summary:
The Unification Church, founded by Sun Myung Moon and Hak Ja Han, is a Christian-based religion. It began in South Korea after World War II. The church believes Moon was the Second Coming of Christ, with a mission to start a new, sin-free family. They are known for their mass weddings.

The church has faced criticism for its teachings and influence. Some call it a cult and question its financial practices. It has a global presence in over 100 countries and is involved in various fields, including business and politics, especially in promoting Korean reunification.
title: Unification Church
